title: Split Strings Into Line Array
description: In this lab, we will explore how to split a multiline string into an array of lines using JavaScript. We will use the String.prototype.split() method and a regular expression to match line breaks and create an array of individual lines. This will be a useful skill for parsing and manipulating text data in web development projects.

meta.title: Split Strings Into Line Array
meta.description: Learn how to split a multiline string into an array of lines using JavaScript.
meta.keywords: string manipulation, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, line break, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, text parsing

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
